Queries.BO_FacturaXML_HBT:
CREATE PROCEDURE "%sNameDB%"."BO_FacturaXML" ( DocEntry INT, Object NVARCHAR(10), Tipo NVARCHAR(100) )
LANGUAGE SQLSCRIPT AS
BEGIN
------------------------- Facturas de clientes -----------------------------------------
IF ( :Object = '13' AND :Tipo = 'Encabezado')
THEN
SELECT (SELECT CASE B."Decimals" WHEN '-1' THEN (SELECT TOP 1 "QueryDec" FROM "%sNameDB%"."OADM") ELSE B."Decimals" END FROM "%sNameDB%"."OINV" A LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OCRN" B ON A."DocCur"=B."CurrCode" WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry) AS "CantidadDecimales",
CASE T0."DocCur" WHEN '$' THEN 'COP' ELSE T0."DocCur" END AS "Moneda",
REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."DocRate"),19,0),',','.') AS "tasaDeCambio",
TO_VARCHAR((T0."DocDate"), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "fechaDeTasaDeCambio",
(T8."U_BO_PREF" || '-' || '132648') AS "RangoNmeracion",
CASE WHEN (SELECT CASE B."Decimals" WHEN '-1' THEN (SELECT TOP 1 "QueryDec" FROM "%sNameDB%"."OADM") ELSE B."Decimals" END FROM "%sNameDB%"."OINV" A LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OCRN" B ON A."DocCur"=B."CurrCode" WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry)= '0' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."RoundDif"),19,0),',','.') WHEN (SELECT CASE B."Decimals" WHEN '-1' THEN (SELECT TOP 1 "QueryDec" FROM "%sNameDB%"."OADM") ELSE B."Decimals" END FROM "%sNameDB%"."OINV" A LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OCRN" B ON A."DocCur"=B."CurrCode" WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry)= '1' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."RoundDif"),19,1),',','.') WHEN (SELECT CASE B."Decimals" WHEN '-1' THEN (SELECT TOP 1 "QueryDec" FROM "%sNameDB%"."OADM") ELSE B."Decimals" END FROM "%sNameDB%"."OINV" A LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OCRN" B ON A."DocCur"=B."CurrCode" WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry)= '2' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."RoundDif"),19,2),',','.') WHEN (SELECT CASE B."Decimals" WHEN '-1' THEN (SELECT TOP 1 "QueryDec" FROM "%sNameDB%"."OADM") ELSE B."Decimals" END FROM "%sNameDB%"."OINV" A LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OCRN" B ON A."DocCur"=B."CurrCode" WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry)= '3' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."RoundDif"),19,3),',','.') WHEN (SELECT CASE B."Decimals" WHEN '-1' THEN (SELECT TOP 1 "QueryDec" FROM "%sNameDB%"."OADM") ELSE B."Decimals" END FROM "%sNameDB%"."OINV" A LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OCRN" B ON A."DocCur"=B."CurrCode" WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry)= '4' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."RoundDif"),19,4),',','.') WHEN (SELECT CASE B."Decimals" WHEN '-1' THEN (SELECT TOP 1 "QueryDec" FROM "%sNameDB%"."OADM") ELSE B."Decimals" END FROM "%sNameDB%"."OINV" A LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OCRN" B ON A."DocCur"=B."CurrCode" WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry)= '5' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."RoundDif"),19,5),',','.') WHEN (SELECT CASE B."Decimals" WHEN '-1' THEN (SELECT TOP 1 "QueryDec" FROM "%sNameDB%"."OADM") ELSE B."Decimals" END FROM "%sNameDB%"."OINV" A LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OCRN" B ON A."DocCur"=B."CurrCode" WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry)= '6' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."RoundDif"),19,6),',','.') ELSE '0' END AS "RedondeoAplicado",
CASE WHEN (SELECT A."Code" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOSERNUM" A WHERE A."Code" = T0."Series") = T0."Series" AND T0."DocSubType" != 'DN' AND T0."ObjType" = '13' THEN '01' WHEN (SELECT A."Code" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOSERNUM" A WHERE A."Code" = T0."Series") = T0."Series" AND T0."DocSubType" != 'DN' AND T0."ObjType" = '13' THEN '03' WHEN (SELECT A."Code" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOSERNUM" A WHERE A."Code" = T0."Series") = T0."Series" AND T0."DocSubType" != 'DN' AND T0."ObjType" = '14' THEN '91' WHEN (SELECT A."Code" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOSERNUM" A WHERE A."Code" = T0."Series") = T0."Series" AND T0."DocSubType" = 'DN' AND T0."ObjType" = '13' THEN '92' ELSE '0' END AS "tipoDocumento",
(SELECT TOP 1 A."U_BO_TO" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOEBILLINGP" A WHERE A."U_BO_Status" = 'Y') AS "tipoOperacion",
CASE WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" = '0' AND T0."DocCur"='$' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL(((SELECT TOP 1 SUM(A."BaseSum") FROM "%sNameDB%"."INV4" A WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry AND A."RelateType" = 1 )),19,2),',','.') WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" != '0' AND T0."DocCur"='$' AND T0."U_EC_FE" IN ('CP', 'S') THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL(((SELECT TOP 1 SUM(A."BaseSum") FROM "%sNameDB%"."INV4" A WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry AND A."RelateType" = 1 )),19,2),',','.') WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" != '0' AND T0."DocCur"='$' AND T0."U_EC_FE" IN ('CP', 'S') THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL(((SELECT TOP 1 SUM(A."BaseSum") FROM "%sNameDB%"."INV4" A WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry AND A."RelateType" = 1 )+T0."DiscSum"),19,2),',','.') WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" = '0' AND T0."DocCur"='USD' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL(((SELECT TOP 1 SUM(A."BaseSumSys") FROM "%sNameDB%"."INV4" A WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry AND A."RelateType" = 1 )+T0."DiscSum"),19,2),',','.') WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" != '0' AND T0."DocCur"='USD' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL(((SELECT TOP 1 SUM(A."BaseSumSys") FROM "%sNameDB%"."INV4" A WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry AND A."RelateType" = 1 )+T0."DiscSum"),19,2),',','.') ELSE REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL(((SELECT TOP 1 SUM(A."BaseSum") FROM "%sNameDB%"."INV4" A WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry AND A."RelateType" = 1 )),19,2),',','.') END AS "totalBaseImponible",
CASE WHEN T0."DocCur"='USD' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL(((SELECT TOP 1 SUM(A."BaseSum") FROM "%sNameDB%"."INV4" A WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry AND A."RelateType" = 1)+T0."VatSumFC"),19,2),',','.') WHEN T0."DocCur"='$' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL(((SELECT TOP 1 SUM(A."BaseSum") FROM "%sNameDB%"."INV4" A WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry AND A."RelateType" = 1)+T0."VatSum"+(SELECT IFNULL(SUM(A."WTAmnt"),0) FROM "%sNameDB%"."INV5" A INNER JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OWHT" B ON A."WTCode"=B."WTCode" WHERE A."AbsEntry" = :DocEntry AND B."U_HBT_TipRet" = '10')),19,2),',','.') ELSE REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."BaseAmntFC"+T0."VatSumFC"),19,2),',','.') END AS "totalBrutoConImpuesto",
CASE WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" = '0' AND T0."DocCur"='$' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL(((SELECT TOP 1 SUM(A."BaseSum")FROM "%sNameDB%"."INV4" A WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry AND A."RelateType" = 1)+T0."VatSum"+T0."RoundDif"+(SELECT IFNULL(SUM(A."WTAmnt"),0) FROM "%sNameDB%"."INV5" A INNER JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OWHT" B ON A."WTCode"=B."WTCode" WHERE A."AbsEntry" = :DocEntry AND B."U_HBT_TipRet" = '10')),19,2),',','.') WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" != '0' AND T0."DocCur"='$' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL(((SELECT TOP 1 SUM(A."BaseSum") FROM "%sNameDB%"."INV4" A WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry AND A."RelateType" = 1)+T0."VatSum"+T0."RoundDif"+(SELECT IFNULL(SUM(A."WTAmnt"),0) FROM "%sNameDB%"."INV5" A INNER JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OWHT" B ON A."WTCode"=B."WTCode" WHERE A."AbsEntry" = :DocEntry AND B."U_HBT_TipRet" = '10')),19,2),',','.') WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" = '0' AND T0."DocCur"='USD' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."BaseAmntFC"+T0."VatSumFC"+T0."RoundDifFC"),19,2),',','.') WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" != '0' AND T0."DocCur"='USD' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."BaseAmntFC"+T0."VatSumFC"+T0."RoundDifFC"+T0."DiscSum"),19,2),',','.') ELSE REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."BaseAmntFC"+T0."VatSumFC"+T0."RoundDifFC"),19,2),',','.') END AS "totalMonto",
CASE WHEN T0."U_EC_FE" IN ('CP', 'S') THEN (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT "StcCode") FROM "%sNameDB%"."INV4" WHERE "DocEntry" = :DocEntry ) ELSE (SELECT COUNT("ItemCode") FROM "%sNameDB%"."INV1" WHERE "DocEntry" = :DocEntry) END AS "totalProductos",
CASE WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" = '0' AND T0."DocCur"='$' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((SELECT TOP 1 SUM(A."BaseSum") FROM "%sNameDB%"."INV4" A WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry AND A."RelateType" = 1 ),19,2),',','.') WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" != '0' AND T0."DocCur"='$' AND T0."U_EC_FE" IN ('CP', 'S') THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL(((SELECT TOP 1 SUM(A."BaseSum") FROM "%sNameDB%"."INV4" A WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry AND A."RelateType" = 1 )),19,2),',','.') WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" != '0' AND T0."DocCur"='$' AND T0."U_EC_FE" IN ('CP', 'S') THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL(((SELECT TOP 1 SUM(A."BaseSum") FROM "%sNameDB%"."INV4" A WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry AND A."RelateType" = 1 )+T0."DiscSum"),19,2),',','.') WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" = '0' AND T0."DocCur"='USD' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."BaseAmntFC"),19,2),',','.') WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" != '0' AND T0."DocCur"='USD' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."BaseAmntFC"),19,2),',','.') ELSE REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."BaseAmntFC"),19,2),',','.') END AS "totalSinImpuestos",
T0."U_BO_DESC" AS "Desc_Codigo",
'Descuento Comercial' AS "Desc_descripcion",
'0' AS "Desc_indicador",
CASE WHEN LEFT(T0."DiscSum", 1) = '-' AND T0."U_EC_FE" IN ('CP', 'S') THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((0),19,2),',','.') WHEN LEFT(T0."DiscSum", 1) != '-' AND T0."U_EC_FE" IN ('CP', 'S') THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((0),19,2),',','.') ELSE REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."DiscSum"),19,2),',','.') END AS "Desc_monto",
((SELECT TOP 1 SUM(A."BaseSum") FROM "%sNameDB%"."INV4" A WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry)+0) AS "Desc_montoBase",
REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."DiscPrcnt"),19,2),',','.') AS "Desc_porcentaje",
'0' AS "Desc_secuencia",
CASE WHEN (SELECT "U_BO_Pref" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOEBILLINGP" WHERE "U_BO_Status"='Y') = 'Y' THEN (T6."BeginStr"||T0."DocNum") ELSE CAST(T0."DocNum" AS NVARCHAR(20)) END AS "consecutivoDocumento",
T8."U_BO_PREF" AS "Prefijo",
TO_VARCHAR((T0."DocDate"), 'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' 00:00:00' AS "fechaEmision",
--TO_VARCHAR(('20230125'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' 00:00:00' AS "fechaEmision",
TO_VARCHAR(T0."DocDueDate", 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "fechaDeVencimiento",
T5."U_HBT_ActEco" AS "actividadEconomicaCIIU",
'0' AS "canalDeEntrega",
CASE WHEN T5."U_BO_E_mail_1" IS NULL THEN (SELECT TOP 1 A."U_BO_EmailGen" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOEBILLINGP" A WHERE A."U_BO_Status" = 'Y') ELSE T5."U_BO_E_mail_1" END AS "correoEntrega1",
T5."U_BO_E_mail_2" AS "correoEntrega2",
T5."U_BO_E_mail_3" AS "correoEntrega3",
T5."U_BO_E_mail_4" AS "correoEntrega4",
T5."U_BO_E_mail_5" AS "correoEntrega5",
TO_VARCHAR(T0."DocDate", 'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' 00:00:00' AS "fechaProgramada",
'1' AS "nitProveedorReceptor",
T5."Phone1" AS "telefono",
'01' AS "codigoImpuesto",
CASE WHEN T4."CityB" IS NULL THEN 'BOGOTA' ELSE T4."CityB" END AS "ciudad",
--CASE WHEN T13."U_HBT_MunMed" = '11001' THEN '11' ELSE T13."U_BO_CD" END AS "codigoDepartamento",
'11' AS "codigoDepartamento",
CASE WHEN T13."Name" IS NULL THEN 'CUNDINAMARCA' ELSE T13."Name" END AS "departamento",
CASE WHEN T4."StreetB" IS NULL THEN T5."Address" ELSE T4."StreetB" END AS "direccion",
'es' AS "lenguaje",
--T5."U_HBT_MunMed" AS "municipio",
'11001' AS "municipio",
'CO' AS "pais",
T4."ZipCodeB" AS "zonaPostal",
CASE WHEN T5."U_BO_E_mail_1" IS NULL THEN (SELECT TOP 1 A."U_BO_EmailGen" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOEBILLINGP" A WHERE A."U_BO_Status" = 'Y') ELSE T5."U_BO_E_mail_1" END AS "email",
'' AS "codigoEstablecimiento",
T5."CardName" AS "nombreRegistroRUT",
CASE T5."U_HBT_TipDoc" WHEN '31' THEN SUBSTRING(T5."LicTradNum",1,LOCATE(T5."LicTradNum",'-')-1) ELSE T5."LicTradNum" END AS "numeroIdentificacion",
CASE T5."U_HBT_TipDoc" WHEN '31' THEN RIGHT(T5."LicTradNum",1) ELSE '' END AS "numeroIdentificacionDV",
T5."U_HBT_TipDoc" AS "tipoIdentificacion",
T5."CardName" AS "nombreRazonSocial",
CASE WHEN T0."U_BO_EE" = 'Y' THEN 'SI' ELSE 'NO' END AS "notificar",
CASE T5."U_HBT_TipDoc" WHEN '31' THEN SUBSTRING(T5."LicTradNum",1,LOCATE(T5."LicTradNum",'-')-1) ELSE T5."LicTradNum" END AS "numeroDocumento",
T5."U_BO_RF" AS "obligaciones",
T5."U_BO_TR" AS "regimen",
T5."U_HBT_TipDoc" AS "tipoIdentificacion",
CASE T5."U_HBT_TipEnt" WHEN '1' THEN '1' WHEN '2' THEN '2' ELSE T5."U_HBT_TipEnt" END AS "tipoPersona",
T0."U_BO_MP" AS "medioPago",
CASE WHEN T11."ExtraDays" > '0' THEN '2' ELSE '1' END AS "FormaPago",
'01' AS "numeroDeReferencia",
'NO' AS "FacturaTieneMuestras",
"Comments" AS "Comentarios",
(SELECT count(W."AbsEntry") FROM "%sNameDB%"."ATC1" W WHERE W."AbsEntry" = T0."AtcEntry") AS "CantidadAdjuntos",
T0."AtcEntry" AS "DocEntryAdjuntos"
FROM "%sNameDB%"."OINV" T0 LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."INV12" T4 ON T0."DocEntry"=T4."DocEntry" LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OCRD" T5 ON T0."CardCode" = T5."CardCode" LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."NNM1" T6 ON T0."Series"=T6."Series" AND T6."ObjectCode" = '13' LEFT OUTER JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OSLP" T7 ON T0."SlpCode" = T7."SlpCode" LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."@BOSERNUM" T8 ON T0."Series"=T8."Code" LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OCTG" T11 ON T0."GroupNum"=T11."GroupNum" LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OSHP" T12 ON T0."TrnspCode" = T12."TrnspCode" LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OCST" T13 ON T4."StateB" = T13."Code" AND T13."Country" ='CO'
WHERE T0."DocEntry" = :DocEntry AND T0."DocSubType" != 'DN';
ELSEIF ( :Object = '13' AND :Tipo = 'Lineas')THEN DECLARE CP NVARCHAR(10);
SELECT TOP 1 Z."U_EC_FE" INTO CP FROM "%sNameDB%"."OINV" Z WHERE Z."DocEntry"=:DocEntry;
IF (:CP) IN ('CP', 'S' )
THEN
SELECT '1' AS "cantidadPorEmpaque",
REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL(('1'),19,2),',','.') AS "cantidadReal",
'94' AS "cantidadRealUnidadMedida",
REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL(('1'),19,2),',','.') AS "cantidadUnidades",
CASE WHEN :CP = 'CP' THEN 'ESF-00427' ELSE '7717072986' END AS "codigoProducto",
CASE WHEN :CP = 'CP' THEN 'CONSUMO PINTURA' ELSE 'PINTURA Y BASES TALLER COLISION ESFERA' END AS "descripcion",
'999' AS "estandarCodigo",
CASE WHEN :CP = 'CP' THEN 'ESF-00427' ELSE '7717072986' END AS "estandarCodigoProducto",
--REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((SUM(T0."LineTotal")),19,2),',','.') AS "baseImponibleTOTALImp",
(SELECT REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((SUM(W."BaseSum")),19,2),',','.') FROM "%sNameDB%"."INV4" W WHERE W."DocEntry" = :DocEntry) AS "baseImponibleTOTALImp",
'01' AS "codigoTOTALImp", '' AS "controlInterno",
REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."VatPrcnt"),19,2),',','.') AS "porcentajeTOTALImp",
'' AS "unidadMedida", '' AS "unidadMedidaTributo",
CASE WHEN SUM(T0."DiscPrcnt") = '0' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((SUM(T0."VatSum")),19,2),',','.') WHEN SUM(T0."DiscPrcnt") != '0' THEN (SELECT REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((SUM(W."TaxSum")),19,2),',','.') FROM "%sNameDB%"."INV4" W WHERE W."DocEntry" = :DocEntry) ELSE '0' END AS "valorTOTALImp",
'' AS "valorTributoUnidad",
CASE WHEN SUM(T0."DiscPrcnt") = '0' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((SUM(T0."VatSum")),19,2),',','.') WHEN SUM(T0."DiscPrcnt") != '0' THEN (SELECT REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((SUM(W."TaxSum")),19,2),',','.') FROM "%sNameDB%"."INV4" W WHERE W."DocEntry" = :DocEntry) ELSE '0' END AS "montoTotal",
'' AS "marca", '0' AS "muestraGratis",
CASE WHEN SUM(T0."DiscPrcnt") = '0' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((SUM(T0."LineTotal" + T0."VatSum")),19,2),',','.') ELSE (SELECT REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((SUM(W."TaxSum"+W."BaseSum")),19,2),',','.') FROM "%sNameDB%"."INV4" W WHERE W."DocEntry" = :DocEntry) END AS "precioTotal",
(SELECT REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((SUM(W."BaseSum")),19,2),',','.') FROM "%sNameDB%"."INV4" W WHERE W."DocEntry" = :DocEntry) AS "precioTotalSinImpuestos",
CASE WHEN SUM(T0."DiscPrcnt") = '0' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((SUM(T0."LineTotal")),19,2),',','.') ELSE (SELECT REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((SUM(W."BaseSum")),19,2),',','.') FROM "%sNameDB%"."INV4" W WHERE W."DocEntry" = :DocEntry) END AS "precioVentaUnitario",
ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY T0."VatPrcnt") AS "secuencia",
'94' AS "unidadMedida",
REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((SUM(0)),19,2),',','.') AS "Desc_porcentaje",
'Descuento Comercial' AS "Desc_descripcion",
'0' AS "Desc_indicador",
REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((SUM(0)),19,2),',','.') AS "Desc_monto",
REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((SUM(0)),19,2),',','.') AS "Desc_montoBase",
'1' AS "Desc_secuencia"
FROM "%sNameDB%"."INV1" T0 LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OITM" T1 ON T0."ItemCode"=T1."ItemCode" LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."@BOUNDMED" T2 ON T1."SalUnitMsr"=T2."Code" LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OINV" T3 ON T0."DocEntry"=T3."DocEntry"
WHERE T0."DocEntry" = :DocEntry AND T3."DocSubType" != 'DN'
GROUP BY T0."VatPrcnt";
ELSE
SELECT '1' AS "cantidadPorEmpaque",
CASE WHEN REPLACE(ROUND(TO_DECIMAL((T0."Quantity"),19,2),2),',','.') = '0.00' THEN '1.00' ELSE REPLACE(ROUND(TO_DECIMAL((T0."Quantity"),19,2),2),',','.') END AS "cantidadReal",
CASE WHEN T2."U_BO_UMDIAN" IS NULL THEN T1."SalUnitMsr" ELSE T2."U_BO_UMDIAN" END AS "cantidadRealUnidadMedida",
CASE WHEN REPLACE(ROUND(TO_DECIMAL((T0."Quantity"),19,2),2),',','.') = '0.00' THEN '1.00' ELSE REPLACE(ROUND(TO_DECIMAL((T0."Quantity"),19,2),2),',','.') END AS "cantidadUnidades",
T0."ItemCode" AS "codigoProducto", T1."ItemName" AS "descripcion", '999' AS "estandarCodigo", T0."ItemCode" AS "estandarCodigoProducto",
REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."LineTotal"),19,2),',','.') AS "baseImponibleTOTALImp",
'01' AS "codigoTOTALImp", '' AS "controlInterno",
REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."VatPrcnt"),19,2),',','.') AS "porcentajeTOTALImp",
'' AS "unidadMedida", '' AS "unidadMedidaTributo",
CASE WHEN IFNULL(T0."DiscPrcnt",0) = '0' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL(((T0."LineTotal"*T0."VatPrcnt")/100),19,2),',','.') WHEN IFNULL(T0."DiscPrcnt",0) != '0' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((((T0."LineTotal")*T0."VatPrcnt")/100),19,2),',','.') ELSE '0' END AS "valorTOTALImp",
'' AS "valorTributoUnidad",
CASE WHEN IFNULL(T0."DiscPrcnt",0) = '0' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL(((T0."LineTotal"*T0."VatPrcnt")/100),19,2),',','.') WHEN IFNULL(T0."DiscPrcnt",0) != '0' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((( (T0."LineTotal")*T0."VatPrcnt")/100),19,2),',','.') ELSE '0' END AS "montoTotal",
'' AS "marca", '0' AS "muestraGratis",
CASE WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" = '0' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."LineTotal" + T0."VatSum"),19,2),',','.') ELSE REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL(((T0."LineTotal") + T0."VatSum"),19,2),',','.') END AS "precioTotal",
REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."LineTotal"),19,2),',','.') AS "precioTotalSinImpuestos",
CASE WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" = '0' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."Price"),19,2),',','.') WHEN LEFT(T0."DiscPrcnt") != '-' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."Price"),19,2),',','.') ELSE REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."PriceBefDi"),19,2),',','.') END AS "precioVentaUnitario",
T0."VisOrder"+1 AS "secuencia",
CASE WHEN T2."U_BO_UMDIAN" IS NULL THEN T1."SalUnitMsr" ELSE T2."U_BO_UMDIAN" END AS "unidadMedida",
CASE WHEN LEFT(T0."DiscPrcnt",1) = '-' THEN '0.00' ELSE REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((IFNULL(T0."DiscPrcnt",0)),19,2),',','.')END AS "Desc_porcentaje",
'Descuento Comercial' AS "Desc_descripcion",
'0' AS "Desc_indicador",
CASE WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" = '0' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((IFNULL(T0."LineTotal",0)),19,2),',','.') ELSE REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((((T0."PriceBefDi"*T0."Quantity")*IFNULL(T0."DiscPrcnt",0))/100),19,2),',','.') END AS "Desc_monto",
CASE WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" = '0' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."LineTotal"),19,2),',','.') ELSE REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."PriceBefDi"*T0."Quantity"),19,2),',','.') END AS "Desc_montoBase",
'1' AS "Desc_secuencia"
FROM "%sNameDB%"."INV1" T0 LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OITM" T1 ON T0."ItemCode"=T1."ItemCode" LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."@BOUNDMED" T2 ON T1."SalUnitMsr"=T2."Code" LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OINV" T3 ON T0."DocEntry"=T3."DocEntry"
WHERE T0."DocEntry" = :DocEntry AND T3."DocSubType" != 'DN'
ORDER BY T0."VisOrder" ;
end if; ELSEIF ( :Object = '13' AND :Tipo = 'Impuestos')
THEN --------------------------- Consulta Impuestos IVA ---------------------------------------
SELECT REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((SUM(T0."BaseSum")),19,2),',','.') AS "baseImponibleTOTALImp",
'01' AS "codigoTOTALImp",
REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."TaxRate"),19,2),',','.') AS "porcentajeTOTALImp",
'WSD' AS "unidadMedida",
REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((SUM(T0."TaxSum")),19,2),',','.') AS "valorTOTALImp"
FROM "%sNameDB%"."INV4" T0 LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OINV" T1 ON T0."DocEntry"=T1."DocEntry"
WHERE T0."DocEntry" = :DocEntry AND T1."DocSubType" != 'DN' AND T0."RelateType" = 1
GROUP BY T0."TaxRate"
--------------------------- Consulta Impuestos ICA ---------------------------------------------------
UNION ALL
SELECT REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((SUM(T0."U_HBT_BaseRet")),19,2),',','.') AS "baseImponibleTOTALImp",
'03' AS "codigoTOTALImp",
REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((SUM(T1."PrctBsAmnt")),19,3),',','.') AS "porcentajeTOTALImp",
'WSD' AS "unidadMedida",
REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((SUM(T0."WTAmnt")),19,2),',','.') AS "valorTOTALImp"
FROM "%sNameDB%"."INV5" T0 INNER JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OWHT" T1 ON T0."WTCode"=T1."WTCode" LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OINV" T2 ON T0."AbsEntry"=T2."DocEntry"
WHERE T0."AbsEntry" = :DocEntry AND T1."U_HBT_TipRet" = '10' AND T2."DocSubType" != 'ND'
GROUP BY T1."PrctBsAmnt", T1."U_HBT_TipRet"
--------------------------- Consulta Impuestos RETEIVA ---------------------------------------------------
UNION ALL
SELECT REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((SUM(T0."U_HBT_BaseRet")),19,2),',','.') AS "baseImponibleTOTALImp",
'05' AS "codigoTOTALImp",
REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((SUM(T1."PrctBsAmnt")),19,2),',','.') AS "porcentajeTOTALImp",
'WSD' AS "unidadMedida",
REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((SUM(T0."WTAmnt")),19,2),',','.') AS "valorTOTALImp"
FROM "%sNameDB%"."INV5" T0 INNER JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OWHT" T1 ON T0."WTCode"=T1."WTCode" LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OINV" T2 ON T0."AbsEntry"=T2."DocEntry"
WHERE T0."AbsEntry" = :DocEntry AND T1."U_HBT_TipRet" = '2' AND T2."DocSubType" != 'ND'

--------------------------- Consulta Impuestos Retefuente ---------------------------------------------------
UNION ALL
SELECT REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((SUM(T0."U_HBT_BaseRet")),19,2),',','.') AS "baseImponibleTOTALImp",
'06' AS "codigoTOTALImp",
REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((SUM(T1."PrctBsAmnt")),19,2),',','.') AS "porcentajeTOTALImp",
'WSD' AS "unidadMedida",
REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((SUM(T0."WTAmnt")),19,2),',','.') AS "valorTOTALImp"
FROM "%sNameDB%"."INV5" T0 INNER JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OWHT" T1 ON T0."WTCode"=T1."WTCode" LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OINV" T2 ON T0."AbsEntry"=T2."DocEntry"
WHERE T0."AbsEntry" = :DocEntry AND T1."U_HBT_TipRet" = '40' AND T2."DocSubType" != 'ND'
GROUP BY T1."PrctBsAmnt", T1."U_HBT_TipRet";
ELSEIF ( :Object = '13' AND :Tipo = 'ImpuestosTotales')
THEN --------------------------- Consulta Impuestos IVA ---------------------------------------
SELECT REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((SUM(T0."BaseSum")),19,2),',','.') AS "baseImponibleTOTALImp",
'01' AS "codigoTOTALImp",
REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."TaxRate"),19,2),',','.') AS "porcentajeTOTALImp",

REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((SUM(T0."TaxSum")),19,2),',','.') AS "valorTOTALImp"

WHERE T0."DocEntry" = :DocEntry AND T1."DocSubType" != 'DN' AND T0."RelateType" = 1 AND T0."TaxRate" != 0
GROUP BY T0."TaxRate"
--------------------------- Consulta Impuestos ICA ---------------------------------------------------
UNION ALL
SELECT REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((SUM(T0."U_HBT_BaseRet")),19,2),',','.') AS "baseImponibleTOTALImp",
'03' AS "codigoTOTALImp",
'1' AS "porcentajeTOTALImp",--REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((SUM(T1."PrctBsAmnt")),19,3),',','.') AS "porcentajeTOTALImp",

WHERE T0."AbsEntry" = :DocEntry AND T1."U_HBT_TipRet" = '10' AND T2."DocSubType" != 'ND'
GROUP BY T1."U_HBT_TipRet" --, T1."PrctBsAmnt"
--------------------------- Consulta Impuestos RETEIVA ---------------------------------------------------
UNION ALL
SELECT REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((SUM(T0."U_HBT_BaseRet")),19,2),',','.') AS "baseImponibleTOTALImp",

REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((SUM(T1."PrctBsAmnt")),19,2),',','.') AS "porcentajeTOTALImp",

REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((SUM(T0."WTAmnt")),19,2),',','.') AS "valorTOTALImp"

WHERE T0."AbsEntry" = :DocEntry AND T1."U_HBT_TipRet" = '2' AND T2."DocSubType" != 'ND'

--------------------------- Consulta Impuestos Retefuente ---------------------------------------------------

REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((SUM(T0."WTAmnt")),19,2),',','.') AS "valorTOTALImp"

GROUP BY T1."U_HBT_TipRet" ;--, T1."PrctBsAmnt", ;
------------------------- NOTAS CREDITO ----------------------------------------- ELSEIF ( :Object = '14' AND :Tipo = 'Encabezado')
THEN
SELECT (SELECT CASE B."Decimals" WHEN '-1' THEN (SELECT TOP 1 "QueryDec" FROM "%sNameDB%"."OADM") ELSE B."Decimals" END FROM "%sNameDB%"."ORIN" A LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OCRN" B ON A."DocCur"=B."CurrCode" WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry) AS "CantidadDecimales",
CASE T0."DocCur" WHEN '$' THEN 'COP' ELSE T0."DocCur" END AS "Moneda",
REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."DocRate"),19,0),',','.') AS "tasaDeCambio",
TO_VARCHAR((T0."DocDate"), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "fechaDeTasaDeCambio",
(T8."U_BO_PREF" || '-' || T6."InitialNum") AS "RangoNmeracion",
CASE WHEN (SELECT CASE B."Decimals" WHEN '-1' THEN (SELECT TOP 1 "QueryDec" FROM "%sNameDB%"."OADM") ELSE B."Decimals" END FROM "%sNameDB%"."ORIN" A LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OCRN" B ON A."DocCur"=B."CurrCode" WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry)= '0' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."RoundDif"),19,0),',','.') WHEN (SELECT CASE B."Decimals" WHEN '-1' THEN (SELECT TOP 1 "QueryDec" FROM "%sNameDB%"."OADM") ELSE B."Decimals" END FROM "%sNameDB%"."ORIN" A LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OCRN" B ON A."DocCur"=B."CurrCode" WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry)= '1' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."RoundDif"),19,1),',','.') WHEN (SELECT CASE B."Decimals" WHEN '-1' THEN (SELECT TOP 1 "QueryDec" FROM "%sNameDB%"."OADM") ELSE B."Decimals" END FROM "%sNameDB%"."ORIN" A LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OCRN" B ON A."DocCur"=B."CurrCode" WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry)= '2' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."RoundDif"),19,2),',','.') WHEN (SELECT CASE B."Decimals" WHEN '-1' THEN (SELECT TOP 1 "QueryDec" FROM "%sNameDB%"."OADM") ELSE B."Decimals" END FROM "%sNameDB%"."ORIN" A LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OCRN" B ON A."DocCur"=B."CurrCode" WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry)= '3' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."RoundDif"),19,3),',','.') WHEN (SELECT CASE B."Decimals" WHEN '-1' THEN (SELECT TOP 1 "QueryDec" FROM "%sNameDB%"."OADM") ELSE B."Decimals" END FROM "%sNameDB%"."ORIN" A LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OCRN" B ON A."DocCur"=B."CurrCode" WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry)= '4' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."RoundDif"),19,4),',','.') WHEN (SELECT CASE B."Decimals" WHEN '-1' THEN (SELECT TOP 1 "QueryDec" FROM "%sNameDB%"."OADM") ELSE B."Decimals" END FROM "%sNameDB%"."ORIN" A LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OCRN" B ON A."DocCur"=B."CurrCode" WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry)= '5' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."RoundDif"),19,5),',','.') WHEN (SELECT CASE B."Decimals" WHEN '-1' THEN (SELECT TOP 1 "QueryDec" FROM "%sNameDB%"."OADM") ELSE B."Decimals" END FROM "%sNameDB%"."ORIN" A LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OCRN" B ON A."DocCur"=B."CurrCode" WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry)= '6' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."RoundDif"),19,6),',','.') ELSE '0' END AS "RedondeoAplicado",
CASE WHEN (SELECT A."Code" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOSERNUM" A WHERE A."Code" = T0."Series") = T0."Series" AND T0."DocSubType" != 'DN' AND T0."ObjType" = '13' THEN '01' WHEN (SELECT A."Code" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOSERNUM" A WHERE A."Code" = T0."Series") = T0."Series" AND T0."DocSubType" != 'DN' AND T0."ObjType" = '13' THEN '03' WHEN (SELECT A."Code" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOSERNUM" A WHERE A."Code" = T0."Series") = T0."Series" AND T0."DocSubType" != 'DN' AND T0."ObjType" = '14' THEN '91' WHEN (SELECT A."Code" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOSERNUM" A WHERE A."Code" = T0."Series") = T0."Series" AND T0."DocSubType" = 'DN' AND T0."ObjType" = '13' THEN '92' ELSE '0' END AS "tipoDocumento",
CASE WHEN T0."ObjType" = '13' THEN (SELECT TOP 1 A."U_BO_TO" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOEBILLINGP" A WHERE A."U_BO_Status" = 'Y') WHEN T0."ObjType" = '14' AND (IFNULL(T0."U_BO_AFV",0))= 0 THEN '22' ELSE (SELECT TOP 1 A."U_BO_TO" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOEBILLINGP" A WHERE A."U_BO_Status" = 'Y') END AS "tipoOperacion",
CASE WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" = '0' AND T0."DocCur"='$' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL(((SELECT TOP 1 SUM(A."BaseSum") FROM "%sNameDB%"."RIN4" A WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry AND A."RelateType" = 1 )),19,2),',','.') WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" != '0' AND T0."DocCur"='$' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL(((SELECT TOP 1 SUM(A."BaseSum") FROM "%sNameDB%"."RIN4" A WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry AND A."RelateType" = 1 )+T0."DiscSum"),19,2),',','.') WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" = '0' AND T0."DocCur"='USD' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL(((SELECT TOP 1 SUM(A."BaseSumSys") FROM "%sNameDB%"."RIN4" A WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry AND A."RelateType" = 1 )+T0."DiscSum"),19,2),',','.') WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" != '0' AND T0."DocCur"='USD' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL(((SELECT TOP 1 SUM(A."BaseSumSys") FROM "%sNameDB%"."RIN4" A WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry AND A."RelateType" = 1 )+T0."DiscSum"),19,2),',','.') ELSE REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL(((SELECT TOP 1 SUM(A."BaseSum") FROM "%sNameDB%"."RIN4" A WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry AND A."RelateType" = 1 )),19,2),',','.') END AS "totalBaseImponible",
CASE WHEN T0."DocCur"='USD' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL(((SELECT TOP 1 SUM(A."BaseSum") FROM "%sNameDB%"."RIN4" A WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry AND A."RelateType" = 1)+T0."VatSumFC"),19,2),',','.') WHEN T0."DocCur"='$' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL(((SELECT TOP 1 SUM(A."BaseSum") FROM "%sNameDB%"."RIN4" A WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry AND A."RelateType" = 1)+T0."VatSum"+(SELECT IFNULL(SUM(A."WTAmnt"),0) FROM "%sNameDB%"."RIN5" A INNER JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OWHT" B ON A."WTCode"=B."WTCode" WHERE A."AbsEntry" = :DocEntry AND B."U_HBT_TipRet" = '10')+T0."DiscSum"),19,2),',','.') ELSE REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."BaseAmntFC"+T0."VatSumFC"),19,2),',','.') END AS "totalBrutoConImpuesto",
CASE WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" = '0' AND T0."DocCur"='$' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL(((SELECT TOP 1 SUM(A."BaseSum") FROM "%sNameDB%"."RIN4" A WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry AND A."RelateType" = 1)+T0."VatSum"+T0."RoundDif"+(SELECT IFNULL(SUM(A."WTAmnt"),0) FROM "%sNameDB%"."RIN5" A INNER JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OWHT" B ON A."WTCode"=B."WTCode" WHERE A."AbsEntry" = :DocEntry AND B."U_HBT_TipRet" = '10')),19,2),',','.') WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" != '0' AND T0."DocCur"='$' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL(((SELECT TOP 1 SUM(A."BaseSum") FROM "%sNameDB%"."RIN4" A WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry AND A."RelateType" = 1)+T0."VatSum"+T0."RoundDif"+(SELECT IFNULL(SUM(A."WTAmnt"),0) FROM "%sNameDB%"."RIN5" A INNER JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OWHT" B ON A."WTCode"=B."WTCode" WHERE A."AbsEntry" = :DocEntry AND B."U_HBT_TipRet" = '10')),19,2),',','.') WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" = '0' AND T0."DocCur"='USD' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."BaseAmntFC"+T0."VatSumFC"+T0."RoundDifFC"),19,2),',','.') WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" != '0' AND T0."DocCur"='USD' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."BaseAmntFC"+T0."VatSumFC"+T0."RoundDifFC"+T0."DiscSum"),19,2),',','.') ELSE REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."BaseAmntFC"+T0."VatSumFC"+T0."RoundDifFC"),19,2),',','.') END AS "totalMonto",
CASE WHEN T0."U_EC_FE" = 'CP' THEN (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT "StcCode") FROM "%sNameDB%"."RIN4" WHERE "DocEntry" = :DocEntry ) ELSE (SELECT COUNT("ItemCode") FROM "%sNameDB%"."RIN1" WHERE "DocEntry" = :DocEntry) END AS "totalProductos",
CASE WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" = '0' AND T0."DocCur"='$' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((SELECT TOP 1 SUM(A."BaseSum") FROM "%sNameDB%"."RIN4" A WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry AND A."RelateType" = 1 ),19,2),',','.') WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" != '0' AND T0."DocCur"='$' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL(((SELECT TOP 1 SUM(A."BaseSum") FROM "%sNameDB%"."RIN4" A WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry AND A."RelateType" = 1 )+T0."DiscSum"),19,2),',','.') WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" = '0' AND T0."DocCur"='$' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."BaseAmntFC"),19,2),',','.') WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" != '0' AND T0."DocCur"='$' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."BaseAmntFC"),19,2),',','.') ELSE REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."BaseAmntFC"),19,2),',','.') END AS "totalSinImpuestos",
T0."U_BO_DESC" AS "Desc_Codigo",
'Descuento Comercial' AS "Desc_descripcion",
'0' AS "Desc_indicador",
REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."DiscSum"),19,2),',','.') AS "Desc_monto",
REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((((SELECT TOP 1 SUM(A."BaseSum") FROM "%sNameDB%"."RIN4" A WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry)+T0."DiscSum")),19,0),',','.') AS "Desc_montoBase",
T0."DiscPrcnt" AS "Desc_porcentaje",
'0' AS "Desc_secuencia",
CASE WHEN (SELECT "U_BO_Pref" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOEBILLINGP" WHERE "U_BO_Status"='Y')= 'Y' THEN (T8."U_BO_PREF"||T0."DocNum") ELSE CAST(T0."DocNum" AS NVARCHAR(20)) END AS "consecutivoDocumento",
T8."U_BO_PREF" AS "Prefijo",
TO_VARCHAR(T0."DocDate", 'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' 00:00:00' AS "fechaEmision",
TO_VARCHAR(T0."DocDueDate", 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "fechaDeVencimiento",
T5."U_HBT_ActEco" AS "actividadEconomicaCIIU",
'0' AS "canalDeEntrega",
CASE WHEN T5."U_BO_E_mail_1" IS NULL THEN (SELECT TOP 1 A."U_BO_EmailGen" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOEBILLINGP" A WHERE A."U_BO_Status" = 'Y') ELSE T5."U_BO_E_mail_1" END AS "correoEntrega1",
T5."U_BO_E_mail_2" AS "correoEntrega2",
T5."U_BO_E_mail_3" AS "correoEntrega3",
T5."U_BO_E_mail_4" AS "correoEntrega4",
T5."U_BO_E_mail_5" AS "correoEntrega5",
TO_VARCHAR(T0."DocDate", 'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' 00:00:00' AS "fechaProgramada",
'1' AS "nitProveedorReceptor",
T5."Phone1" AS "telefono",
'01' AS "codigoImpuesto",
T4."CityB" AS "ciudad",
'11' AS "codigoDepartamento",
CASE WHEN T13."Name" IS NULL THEN 'CUNDINAMARCA' ELSE T13."Name" END AS "departamento",
CASE WHEN T4."StreetB" IS NULL THEN T5."Address" ELSE T4."StreetB" END AS "direccion",
'es' AS "lenguaje",
--T5."U_HBT_MunMed" AS "municipio",
'11001' AS "municipio",
'CO' AS "pais",
T4."ZipCodeB" AS "zonaPostal",
CASE WHEN T5."U_BO_E_mail_1" IS NULL THEN (SELECT TOP 1 A."U_BO_EmailGen" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOEBILLINGP" A WHERE A."U_BO_Status" = 'Y') ELSE T5."U_BO_E_mail_1" END AS "email",
'' AS "codigoEstablecimiento",
T5."CardName" AS "nombreRegistroRUT",
CASE T5."U_HBT_TipDoc" WHEN '31' THEN SUBSTRING(T5."LicTradNum",1,LOCATE(T5."LicTradNum",'-')-1) ELSE T5."LicTradNum" END AS "numeroIdentificacion",
CASE T5."U_HBT_TipDoc" WHEN '31' THEN RIGHT(T5."LicTradNum",1) ELSE '' END AS "numeroIdentificacionDV",
T5."U_HBT_TipDoc" AS "tipoIdentificacion",
T5."CardName" AS "nombreRazonSocial",
CASE WHEN T0."U_BO_EE" = 'Y' THEN 'SI' ELSE 'NO' END AS "notificar",
CASE T5."U_HBT_TipDoc" WHEN '31'THEN SUBSTRING(T5."LicTradNum",1,LOCATE(T5."LicTradNum",'-')-1) ELSE T5."LicTradNum" END AS "numeroDocumento",
T5."U_BO_RF" AS "obligaciones",
T5."U_BO_TR" AS "regimen",
T5."U_HBT_TipDoc" AS "tipoIdentificacion",
CASE T5."U_HBT_TipEnt" WHEN '1' THEN '1' WHEN '2' THEN '2' ELSE T5."U_HBT_TipEnt" END AS "tipoPersona",
CASE WHEN T0."U_BO_MP" IS NULL THEN '10' ELSE T0."U_BO_MP" END AS "medioPago",
CASE WHEN T11."ExtraDays" > '0' THEN '2' ELSE '1' END AS "FormaPago",
'01' AS "numeroDeReferencia",
T0."U_BO_TN" AS "codigoEstatusDocumento",
'4' AS "codigoInterno",
ifnull(T0."U_BO_AFV",0) AS "No_FV",
T0."U_BO_EBC" AS "Comentarios_NC",
'NO' AS "FacturaTieneMuestras",
(SELECT count(W."AbsEntry") FROM "%sNameDB%"."ATC1" W WHERE W."AbsEntry" = T0."AtcEntry") AS "CantidadAdjuntos",
T0."AtcEntry" AS "DocEntryAdjuntos",
"Comments" AS "Comentarios"
FROM "%sNameDB%"."ORIN" T0 LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."RIN12" T4 ON T0."DocEntry"=T4."DocEntry" LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OCRD" T5 ON T0."CardCode" = T5."CardCode" LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."NNM1" T6 ON T0."Series"=T6."Series" AND T6."ObjectCode" = '14' LEFT OUTER JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OSLP" T7 ON T0."SlpCode" = T7."SlpCode" LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."@BOSERNUM" T8 ON T0."Series"=T8."Code" LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OCTG" T11 ON T0."GroupNum"=T11."GroupNum" LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OSHP" T12 ON T0."TrnspCode" = T12."TrnspCode" LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OCST" T13 ON T4."StateB" = T13."Code" AND T13."Country" ='CO'
WHERE T0."DocEntry" = :DocEntry AND T0."DocSubType" != 'ND';
ELSEIF ( :Object = '14' AND :Tipo = 'Lineas') THEN
DECLARE CP NVARCHAR(10);
SELECT TOP 1 Z."U_EC_FE" INTO CP FROM "%sNameDB%"."ORIN" Z WHERE Z."DocEntry"=:DocEntry;
IF (:CP)='CP'
THEN
SELECT '1' AS "cantidadPorEmpaque",
REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL(('1'),19,2),',','.') AS "cantidadReal",
'94' AS "cantidadRealUnidadMedida",
REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL(('1'),19,2),',','.') AS "cantidadUnidades",
'ESF-00427' AS "codigoProducto",
'CONSUMO PINTURA' AS "descripcion",
'999' AS "estandarCodigo",
'ESF-00427' AS "estandarCodigoProducto",
REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((SUM(T0."LineTotal")),19,2),',','.') AS "baseImponibleTOTALImp",
'01' AS "codigoTOTALImp", '' AS "controlInterno",
REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."VatPrcnt"),19,2),',','.') AS "porcentajeTOTALImp",
'' AS "unidadMedida", '' AS "unidadMedidaTributo",
CASE WHEN SUM(T0."DiscPrcnt") = '0' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((SUM(T0."VatSum")),19,2),',','.') WHEN SUM(T0."DiscPrcnt") != '0' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL(SUM(((T0."LineTotal"*T0."VatPrcnt")/100)),19,2),',','.') ELSE '0' END AS "valorTOTALImp",
'' AS "valorTributoUnidad",
CASE WHEN SUM(T0."DiscPrcnt") = '0' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((SUM(T0."VatSum")),19,2),',','.') WHEN SUM(T0."DiscPrcnt") != '0' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL(SUM(((T0."LineTotal"*T0."VatPrcnt")/100)),19,2),',','.') ELSE '0' END AS "montoTotal",
'' AS "marca", '0' AS "muestraGratis",
CASE WHEN SUM(T0."DiscPrcnt") = '0' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((SUM(T0."LineTotal" + T0."VatSum")),19,2),',','.') ELSE REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((SUM(T0."LineTotal" + T0."VatSum")),19,2),',','.') END AS "precioTotal",
REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((SUM(T0."LineTotal")),19,2),',','.') AS "precioTotalSinImpuestos",
CASE WHEN SUM(T0."DiscPrcnt") = '0' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((SUM(T0."LineTotal")),19,2),',','.') ELSE REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((SUM(T0."LineTotal")),19,2),',','.') END AS "precioVentaUnitario",
ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY T0."VatPrcnt") AS "secuencia",
'94' AS "unidadMedida",
REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((SUM(0)),19,2),',','.') AS "Desc_porcentaje",
'Descuento Comercial' AS "Desc_descripcion",
'0' AS "Desc_indicador",
REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((SUM(0)),19,2),',','.') AS "Desc_monto",
REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((SUM(0)),19,2),',','.') AS "Desc_montoBase",
'1' AS "Desc_secuencia"
FROM "%sNameDB%"."RIN1" T0 LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OITM" T1 ON T0."ItemCode"=T1."ItemCode" LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."@BOUNDMED" T2 ON T1."SalUnitMsr"=T2."Code" LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."ORIN" T3 ON T0."DocEntry"=T3."DocEntry"
WHERE T0."DocEntry" = :DocEntry AND T3."DocSubType" != 'DN'
GROUP BY T0."VatPrcnt";
ELSE
SELECT '1' AS "cantidadPorEmpaque",
CASE WHEN REPLACE(ROUND(TO_DECIMAL((T0."Quantity"),19,2),2),',','.') = '0.00' THEN '1.00' ELSE REPLACE(ROUND(TO_DECIMAL((T0."Quantity"),19,2),2),',','.') END AS "cantidadReal",
CASE WHEN T2."U_BO_UMDIAN" IS NULL THEN T1."SalUnitMsr" ELSE T2."U_BO_UMDIAN" END AS "cantidadRealUnidadMedida",
CASE WHEN REPLACE(ROUND(TO_DECIMAL((T0."Quantity"),19,2),2),',','.') = '0.00' THEN '1.00' ELSE REPLACE(ROUND(TO_DECIMAL((T0."Quantity"),19,2),2),',','.') END AS "cantidadUnidades",
T0."ItemCode" AS "codigoProducto", T1."ItemName" AS "descripcion", '999' AS "estandarCodigo", T0."ItemCode" AS "estandarCodigoProducto",
REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."LineTotal"),19,2),',','.') AS "baseImponibleTOTALImp",
'01' AS "codigoTOTALImp", '' AS "controlInterno",
REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."VatPrcnt"),19,2),',','.') AS "porcentajeTOTALImp",
'' AS "unidadMedida", '' AS "unidadMedidaTributo",
CASE WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" = '0' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL(((T0."LineTotal"*T0."VatPrcnt")/100),19,2),',','.') WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" != '0' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((((T0."LineTotal")*T0."VatPrcnt")/100),19,2),',','.') ELSE '0' END AS "valorTOTALImp",
'' AS "valorTributoUnidad",
CASE WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" = '0' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL(((T0."LineTotal"*T0."VatPrcnt")/100),19,2),',','.') WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" != '0' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((( (T0."LineTotal")*T0."VatPrcnt")/100),19,2),',','.') ELSE '0' END AS "montoTotal",
'' AS "marca", '0' AS "muestraGratis",
CASE WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" = '0' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."LineTotal" + T0."VatSum"),19,2),',','.') ELSE REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL(((T0."LineTotal") + T0."VatSum"),19,2),',','.') END AS "precioTotal",
REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."LineTotal"),19,2),',','.') AS "precioTotalSinImpuestos",
CASE WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" = '0' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."Price"),19,2),',','.') WHEN LEFT(T0."DiscPrcnt") != '-' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."Price"),19,2),',','.') ELSE REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."PriceBefDi"),19,2),',','.') END AS "precioVentaUnitario",
T0."VisOrder"+1 AS "secuencia",
CASE WHEN T2."U_BO_UMDIAN" IS NULL THEN T1."SalUnitMsr" ELSE T2."U_BO_UMDIAN" END AS "unidadMedida",
CASE WHEN LEFT(T0."DiscPrcnt",1) = '-' THEN '0.00' ELSE REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."DiscPrcnt"),19,2),',','.')END AS "Desc_porcentaje",
'Descuento Comercial' AS "Desc_descripcion",
'0' AS "Desc_indicador",
CASE WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" = '0' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."LineTotal"),19,2),',','.') ELSE REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((((T0."PriceBefDi"*T0."Quantity")*T0."DiscPrcnt")/100),19,2),',','.') END AS "Desc_monto",
CASE WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" = '0' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."LineTotal"),19,2),',','.') ELSE REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."PriceBefDi"*T0."Quantity"),19,2),',','.') END AS "Desc_montoBase",
'1' AS "Desc_secuencia"
FROM "%sNameDB%"."RIN1" T0 LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OITM" T1 ON T0."ItemCode"=T1."ItemCode" LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."@BOUNDMED" T2 ON T1."SalUnitMsr"=T2."Code" LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."ORIN" T3 ON T0."DocEntry"=T3."DocEntry"
WHERE T0."DocEntry" = :DocEntry AND T3."DocSubType" != 'DN'
ORDER BY T0."VisOrder" ;
end if;

ELSEIF ( :Object = '13_ND' AND :Tipo = 'Encabezado')
THEN
SELECT (SELECT CASE B."Decimals" WHEN '-1' THEN (SELECT TOP 1 "QueryDec" FROM "%sNameDB%"."OADM") ELSE B."Decimals" END FROM "%sNameDB%"."OINV" A LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OCRN" B ON A."DocCur"=B."CurrCode" WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry) AS "CantidadDecimales",
CASE T0."DocCur" WHEN '$' THEN 'COP' ELSE T0."DocCur" END AS "Moneda",
(T8."U_BO_PREF" || '-' || T6."InitialNum") AS "RangoNmeracion",
CASE WHEN (SELECT CASE B."Decimals" WHEN '-1' THEN (SELECT TOP 1 "QueryDec" FROM "%sNameDB%"."OADM") ELSE B."Decimals" END FROM "%sNameDB%"."OINV" A LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OCRN" B ON A."DocCur"=B."CurrCode" WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry)= '0' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."RoundDif"),19,0),',','.') WHEN (SELECT CASE B."Decimals" WHEN '-1' THEN (SELECT TOP 1 "QueryDec" FROM "%sNameDB%"."OADM") ELSE B."Decimals" END FROM "%sNameDB%"."OINV" A LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OCRN" B ON A."DocCur"=B."CurrCode" WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry)= '1' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."RoundDif"),19,1),',','.') WHEN (SELECT CASE B."Decimals" WHEN '-1' THEN (SELECT TOP 1 "QueryDec" FROM "%sNameDB%"."OADM") ELSE B."Decimals" END FROM "%sNameDB%"."OINV" A LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OCRN" B ON A."DocCur"=B."CurrCode" WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry)= '2' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."RoundDif"),19,2),',','.') WHEN (SELECT CASE B."Decimals" WHEN '-1' THEN (SELECT TOP 1 "QueryDec" FROM "%sNameDB%"."OADM") ELSE B."Decimals" END FROM "%sNameDB%"."OINV" A LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OCRN" B ON A."DocCur"=B."CurrCode" WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry)= '3' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."RoundDif"),19,3),',','.') WHEN (SELECT CASE B."Decimals" WHEN '-1' THEN (SELECT TOP 1 "QueryDec" FROM "%sNameDB%"."OADM") ELSE B."Decimals" END FROM "%sNameDB%"."OINV" A LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OCRN" B ON A."DocCur"=B."CurrCode" WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry)= '4' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."RoundDif"),19,4),',','.') WHEN (SELECT CASE B."Decimals" WHEN '-1' THEN (SELECT TOP 1 "QueryDec" FROM "%sNameDB%"."OADM") ELSE B."Decimals" END FROM "%sNameDB%"."OINV" A LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OCRN" B ON A."DocCur"=B."CurrCode" WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry)= '5' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."RoundDif"),19,5),',','.') WHEN (SELECT CASE B."Decimals" WHEN '-1' THEN (SELECT TOP 1 "QueryDec" FROM "%sNameDB%"."OADM") ELSE B."Decimals" END FROM "%sNameDB%"."OINV" A LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OCRN" B ON A."DocCur"=B."CurrCode" WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry)= '6' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."RoundDif"),19,6),',','.') ELSE '0' END AS "RedondeoAplicado",
CASE WHEN (SELECT A."Code" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOSERNUM" A WHERE A."Code" = T0."Series") = T0."Series" AND T0."DocSubType" != 'DN' AND T0."ObjType" = '13' THEN '01' WHEN (SELECT A."Code" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOSERNUM" A WHERE A."Code" = T0."Series") = T0."Series" AND T0."DocSubType" != 'DN' AND T0."ObjType" = '13' THEN '03' WHEN (SELECT A."Code" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOSERNUM" A WHERE A."Code" = T0."Series") = T0."Series" AND T0."DocSubType" != 'DN' AND T0."ObjType" = '14' THEN '91' WHEN (SELECT A."Code" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOSERNUM" A WHERE A."Code" = T0."Series") = T0."Series" AND T0."DocSubType" = 'DN' AND T0."ObjType" = '13' THEN '92' ELSE '0' END AS "tipoDocumento",
(SELECT TOP 1 A."U_BO_TO" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOEBILLINGP" A WHERE A."U_BO_Status" = 'Y') AS "tipoOperacion",
CASE WHEN T0."DocCur"='$' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."BaseAmnt"),19,2),',','.') WHEN T0."DocCur"='USD' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."BaseAmntFC"),19,2),',','.') ELSE REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."BaseAmntFC"),19,2),',','.') END AS "totalBaseImponible",
CASE WHEN T0."DocCur"='USD' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."BaseAmntFC"+T0."VatSumFC"+T0."RoundDifFC"),19,2),',','.') WHEN T0."DocCur"='$' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."BaseAmnt"+T0."VatSum"+T0."RoundDif"+(SELECT IFNULL(SUM(A."WTAmnt"),0) FROM "%sNameDB%"."INV5" A INNER JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OWHT" B ON A."WTCode"=B."WTCode" WHERE A."AbsEntry" = :DocEntry AND B."U_HBT_TipRet" = '1')),19,2),',','.') ELSE REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."BaseAmntFC"+T0."VatSumFC"+T0."RoundDifFC"),19,2),',','.') END AS "totalBrutoConImpuesto",
CASE WHEN T0."DocCur"='USD' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."BaseAmntFC"+T0."VatSumFC"+T0."RoundDifFC"),19,2),',','.') WHEN T0."DocCur"='$' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."BaseAmnt"+T0."VatSum"+T0."RoundDif"+(SELECT IFNULL(SUM(A."WTAmnt"),0) FROM "%sNameDB%"."INV5" A INNER JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OWHT" B ON A."WTCode"=B."WTCode" WHERE A."AbsEntry" = :DocEntry AND B."U_HBT_TipRet" = '1')),19,2),',','.') ELSE REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."BaseAmntFC"+T0."VatSumFC"+T0."RoundDifFC"),19,2),',','.') END AS "totalMonto",
(SELECT COUNT(A."ItemCode") FROM "%sNameDB%"."INV1" A LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OINV" B ON A."DocEntry"=B."DocEntry" WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry AND b."DocSubType" = 'DN' ) AS "totalProductos",
CASE WHEN T0."DocCur"='$' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."BaseAmnt"),19,2),',','.') WHEN T0."DocCur"='USD' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."BaseAmntFC"),19,2),',','.') ELSE REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."BaseAmntFC"),19,2),',','.') END AS "totalSinImpuestos",
T0."U_BO_DESC" AS "Desc_Codigo",
'Descuento Comercial' AS "Desc_descripcion",
'0' AS "Desc_indicador",
REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."DiscSum"),19,0),',','.') AS "Desc_monto",
((SELECT TOP 1 SUM(A."BaseSum") FROM "%sNameDB%"."INV4" A WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry)+T0."DiscSum") AS "Desc_montoBase",
T0."DiscPrcnt" AS "Desc_porcentaje",
'0' AS "Desc_secuencia",
CASE WHEN (SELECT "U_BO_Pref" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOEBILLINGP" WHERE "U_BO_Status"='Y') = 'Y' THEN (T8."U_BO_PREF"||T0."DocNum") ELSE CAST(T0."DocNum" AS NVARCHAR(20)) END AS "consecutivoDocumento",
T8."U_BO_PREF" AS "Prefijo",
TO_VARCHAR(T0."DocDate", 'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' 00:00:00' AS "fechaEmision",
TO_VARCHAR(T0."DocDueDate", 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "fechaDeVencimiento",
T5."U_HBT_ActEco" AS "actividadEconomicaCIIU",
'0' AS "canalDeEntrega",
CASE WHEN T5."U_BO_E_mail_1" IS NULL THEN (SELECT TOP 1 A."U_BO_EmailGen" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOEBILLINGP" A WHERE A."U_BO_Status" = 'Y') ELSE T5."U_BO_E_mail_1" END AS "correoEntrega1",
T5."U_BO_E_mail_2" AS "correoEntrega2",
T5."U_BO_E_mail_3" AS "correoEntrega3",
T5."U_BO_E_mail_4" AS "correoEntrega4",
T5."U_BO_E_mail_5" AS "correoEntrega5",
TO_VARCHAR(T0."DocDate", 'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' 00:00:00' AS "fechaProgramada",
'1' AS "nitProveedorReceptor",
T5."Phone1" AS "telefono",
'01' AS "codigoImpuesto",
T4."CityB" AS "ciudad",
T13."U_BO_CD" AS "codigoDepartamento",
T13."Name" AS "departamento",
T4."StreetB" AS "direccion",
'es' AS "lenguaje",
T5."U_HBT_MunMed" AS "municipio",
'CO' AS "pais",

CASE WHEN T5."U_BO_E_mail_1" IS NULL THEN (SELECT TOP 1 A."U_BO_EmailGen" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOEBILLINGP" A WHERE A."U_BO_Status" = 'Y') ELSE T5."U_BO_E_mail_1" END AS "email",
'' AS "codigoEstablecimiento",
T5."CardName" AS "nombreRegistroRUT",
CASE T5."U_HBT_TipDoc" WHEN '31' THEN SUBSTRING(T5."LicTradNum",1,LOCATE(T5."LicTradNum",'-')-1) ELSE T5."LicTradNum" END AS "numeroIdentificacion",
CASE T5."U_HBT_TipDoc" WHEN '31' THEN RIGHT(T5."LicTradNum",1) ELSE '' END AS "numeroIdentificacionDV",
T5."U_HBT_TipDoc" AS "tipoIdentificacion",
T5."CardName" AS "nombreRazonSocial",
CASE WHEN T0."U_BO_EE" = 'Y' THEN 'SI' ELSE 'NO' END AS "notificar",
CASE T5."U_HBT_TipDoc" WHEN '31' THEN SUBSTRING(T5."LicTradNum",1,LOCATE(T5."LicTradNum",'-')-1) ELSE T5."LicTradNum" END AS "numeroDocumento",
T5."U_BO_RF" AS "obligaciones",
T5."U_BO_TR" AS "regimen",
T5."U_HBT_TipDoc" AS "tipoIdentificacion",
CASE T5."U_HBT_TipEnt" WHEN '1' THEN '1' WHEN '2' THEN '2' ELSE T5."U_HBT_TipEnt" END AS "tipoPersona",
T0."U_BO_MP" AS "medioPago",
CASE WHEN T11."ExtraDays" > '0' THEN '2' ELSE '1' END AS "FormaPago",
'01' AS "numeroDeReferencia",
T0."U_BO_TipND" AS "codigoEstatusDocumento",
'4' AS "codigoInterno",
T0."U_BO_AFV" AS "No_FV",
T0."U_BO_EBC" AS "Comentarios_NC",
'NO' AS "FacturaTieneMuestras"
FROM "%sNameDB%"."OINV" T0 LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."INV12" T4 ON T0."DocEntry"=T4."DocEntry" LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OCRD" T5 ON T0."CardCode" = T5."CardCode" LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."NNM1" T6 ON T0."Series"=T6."Series" AND T6."ObjectCode" = '13' LEFT OUTER JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OSLP" T7 ON T0."SlpCode" = T7."SlpCode" LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."@BOSERNUM" T8 ON T0."Series"=T8."Code" LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OCTG" T11 ON T0."GroupNum"=T11."GroupNum" LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OSHP" T12 ON T0."TrnspCode" = T12."TrnspCode" LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OCST" T13 ON T4."StateB" = T13."Code" AND T13."Country" ='CO'
WHERE T0."DocEntry" = :DocEntry AND T0."DocSubType" = 'DN';
ELSEIF ( :Object = '13_ND' AND :Tipo = 'Lineas')
THEN
SELECT '1' AS "cantidadPorEmpaque",
REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."Quantity"),19,2),',','.') AS "cantidadReal",
CASE WHEN T2."U_BO_UMDIAN" IS NULL THEN T1."SalUnitMsr" ELSE T2."U_BO_UMDIAN" END AS "cantidadRealUnidadMedida",
REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."Quantity"),19,2),',','.') AS "cantidadUnidades",
T0."ItemCode" AS "codigoProducto", T0."Dscription" AS "descripcion", '999' AS "estandarCodigo", T0."ItemCode" AS "estandarCodigoProducto",
REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."LineTotal"),19,2),',','.') AS "baseImponibleTOTALImp",
'01' AS "codigoTOTALImp", '' AS "controlInterno",
REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."VatPrcnt"),19,2),',','.') AS "porcentajeTOTALImp",
'' AS "unidadMedida", '' AS "unidadMedidaTributo",
REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."VatSum"),19,2),',','.') AS "valorTOTALImp",
'' AS "valorTributoUnidad",
REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."VatSum"),19,2),',','.') AS "montoTotal",
'' AS "marca", '0' AS "muestraGratis",
REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."LineTotal" + T0."VatSum"),19,2),',','.') AS "precioTotal", REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."LineTotal"),19,2),',','.') AS "precioTotalSinImpuestos", REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."Price"),19,2),',','.') AS "precioVentaUnitario",
T0."VisOrder"+1 AS "secuencia", CASE WHEN T2."U_BO_UMDIAN" IS NULL THEN T1."SalUnitMsr" ELSE T2."U_BO_UMDIAN" END AS "unidadMedida",
REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."DiscPrcnt"),19,2),',','.') AS "Desc_porcentaje",
'Descuento Comercial' AS "Desc_descripcion",
'0' AS "Desc_indicador",
CASE WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" = '0' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."LineTotal"),19,2),',','.') ELSE REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((((T0."PriceBefDi"*T0."Quantity")*T0."DiscPrcnt")/100),19,2),',','.') END AS "Desc_monto",
CASE WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" = '0' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."LineTotal"),19,2),',','.') ELSE REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."PriceBefDi"*T0."Quantity"),19,2),',','.') END AS "Desc_montoBase",
'1' AS "Desc_secuencia"
FROM "%sNameDB%"."INV1" T0 LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OITM" T1 ON T0."ItemCode"=T1."ItemCode" LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."@BOUNDMED" T2 ON T1."SalUnitMsr"=T2."Code" LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OINV" T3 ON T0."DocEntry"=T3."DocEntry"
WHERE T0."DocEntry" = :DocEntry AND T3."DocSubType" = 'DN'
ORDER BY T0."VisOrder" ;
ELSEIF ( :Object = '13_ND' AND :Tipo = 'Impuestos')
THEN --------------------------- Consulta Impuestos IVA ---------------------------------------
SELECT REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((SUM(T0."BaseSum")),19,2),',','.') AS "baseImponibleTOTALImp",
'01' AS "codigoTOTALImp",
REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."TaxRate"),19,2),',','.') AS "porcentajeTOTALImp",
'WSD' AS "unidadMedida",
REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((SUM(T0."TaxSum")),19,2),',','.') AS "valorTOTALImp"

WHERE T0."DocEntry" = :DocEntry AND T1."DocSubType" = 'DN' AND T0."RelateType" = 1
GROUP BY T0."TaxRate"
--------------------------- Consulta Impuestos ICA ---------------------------------------------------

SELECT REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((SUM(T0."U_HBT_BaseRet")),19,2),',','.') AS "baseImponibleTOTALImp",

REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((SUM(T0."WTAmnt")),19,2),',','.') AS "valorTOTALImp"

WHERE T0."AbsEntry" = :DocEntry AND T1."U_HBT_TipRet" = '1' AND T2."DocSubType" = 'DN'

--------------------------- Consulta Impuestos RETEIVA ---------------------------------------------------

'WSD' AS "unidadMedida",
REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((SUM(T0."WTAmnt")),19,2),',','.') AS "valorTOTALImp"
FROM "%sNameDB%"."INV5" T0 INNER JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OWHT" T1 ON T0."WTCode"=T1."WTCode" LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OINV" T2 ON T0."AbsEntry"=T2."DocEntry"
WHERE T0."AbsEntry" = :DocEntry AND T1."U_HBT_TipRet" = '2' AND T2."DocSubType" = 'DN'
GROUP BY T1."PrctBsAmnt", T1."U_HBT_TipRet"
--------------------------- Consulta Impuestos Retefuente ---------------------------------------------------
UNION ALL
SELECT REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((SUM(T0."U_HBT_BaseRet")),19,2),',','.') AS "baseImponibleTOTALImp",
'06' AS "codigoTOTALImp",
REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((SUM(T1."PrctBsAmnt")),19,2),',','.') AS "porcentajeTOTALImp",
'WSD' AS "unidadMedida",
REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((SUM(T0."WTAmnt")),19,2),',','.') AS "valorTOTALImp"
FROM "%sNameDB%"."INV5" T0 INNER JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OWHT" T1 ON T0."WTCode"=T1."WTCode" LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OINV" T2 ON T0."AbsEntry"=T2."DocEntry"
WHERE T0."AbsEntry" = :DocEntry AND T1."U_HBT_TipRet" = '4' AND T2."DocSubType" = 'DN'

ELSEIF ( :Object = '18' AND :Tipo = 'Encabezado')
THEN
SELECT (SELECT CASE B."Decimals" WHEN '-1' THEN (SELECT TOP 1 "QueryDec" FROM "%sNameDB%"."OADM") ELSE B."Decimals" END FROM "%sNameDB%"."OPCH" A LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OCRN" B ON A."DocCur"=B."CurrCode" WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry) AS "CantidadDecimales",
CASE T0."DocCur" WHEN '$' THEN 'COP' ELSE T0."DocCur" END AS "Moneda",

TO_VARCHAR((T0."DocDate"), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "fechaDeTasaDeCambio",
(T8."U_BO_PREF" || '-' || ('501')) AS "RangoNmeracion",
CASE WHEN (SELECT CASE B."Decimals" WHEN '-1' THEN (SELECT TOP 1 "QueryDec" FROM "%sNameDB%"."OADM") ELSE B."Decimals" END FROM "%sNameDB%"."OPCH" A LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OCRN" B ON A."DocCur"=B."CurrCode" WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry)= '0' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."RoundDif"),19,0),',','.') WHEN (SELECT CASE B."Decimals" WHEN '-1' THEN (SELECT TOP 1 "QueryDec" FROM "%sNameDB%"."OADM") ELSE B."Decimals" END FROM "%sNameDB%"."OPCH" A LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OCRN" B ON A."DocCur"=B."CurrCode" WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry)= '1' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."RoundDif"),19,1),',','.') WHEN (SELECT CASE B."Decimals" WHEN '-1' THEN (SELECT TOP 1 "QueryDec" FROM "%sNameDB%"."OADM") ELSE B."Decimals" END FROM "%sNameDB%"."OPCH" A LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OCRN" B ON A."DocCur"=B."CurrCode" WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry)= '2' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."RoundDif"),19,2),',','.') WHEN (SELECT CASE B."Decimals" WHEN '-1' THEN (SELECT TOP 1 "QueryDec" FROM "%sNameDB%"."OADM") ELSE B."Decimals" END FROM "%sNameDB%"."OPCH" A LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OCRN" B ON A."DocCur"=B."CurrCode" WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry)= '3' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."RoundDif"),19,3),',','.') WHEN (SELECT CASE B."Decimals" WHEN '-1' THEN (SELECT TOP 1 "QueryDec" FROM "%sNameDB%"."OADM") ELSE B."Decimals" END FROM "%sNameDB%"."OPCH" A LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OCRN" B ON A."DocCur"=B."CurrCode" WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry)= '4' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."RoundDif"),19,4),',','.') WHEN (SELECT CASE B."Decimals" WHEN '-1' THEN (SELECT TOP 1 "QueryDec" FROM "%sNameDB%"."OADM") ELSE B."Decimals" END FROM "%sNameDB%"."OPCH" A LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OCRN" B ON A."DocCur"=B."CurrCode" WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry)= '5' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."RoundDif"),19,5),',','.') WHEN (SELECT CASE B."Decimals" WHEN '-1' THEN (SELECT TOP 1 "QueryDec" FROM "%sNameDB%"."OADM") ELSE B."Decimals" END FROM "%sNameDB%"."OPCH" A LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OCRN" B ON A."DocCur"=B."CurrCode" WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry)= '6' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."RoundDif"),19,6),',','.') ELSE '0' END AS "RedondeoAplicado",
CASE WHEN (SELECT A."Code" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOSERNUM" A WHERE A."Code" = T0."Series") = T0."Series" AND T0."DocSubType" != 'DN' AND T0."ObjType" = '13' THEN '01' WHEN (SELECT A."Code" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOSERNUM" A WHERE A."Code" = T0."Series") = T0."Series" AND T0."DocSubType" != 'DN' AND T0."ObjType" = '13' THEN '03' WHEN (SELECT A."Code" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOSERNUM" A WHERE A."Code" = T0."Series") = T0."Series" AND T0."DocSubType" != 'DN' AND T0."ObjType" = '14' THEN '91' WHEN (SELECT A."Code" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOSERNUM" A WHERE A."Code" = T0."Series") = T0."Series" AND T0."DocSubType" = 'DN' AND T0."ObjType" = '13' THEN '92' WHEN (SELECT A."Code" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOSERNUM" A WHERE A."Code" = T0."Series") = T0."Series" AND T0."DocSubType" != 'DN' AND T0."ObjType" = '18' THEN '05' ELSE '0' END AS "tipoDocumento",
(SELECT TOP 1 A."U_BO_TO" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOEBILLINGP" A WHERE A."U_BO_Status" = 'Y') AS "tipoOperacion",
CASE WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" = '0' AND T0."DocCur"='$' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL(((SELECT TOP 1 SUM(A."BaseSum") FROM "%sNameDB%"."PCH4" A WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry AND A."RelateType" = 1 )),19,2),',','.') WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" != '0' AND T0."DocCur"='$' AND T0."U_EC_FE" IN ('CP', 'S') THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL(((SELECT TOP 1 SUM(A."BaseSum") FROM "%sNameDB%"."PCH4" A WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry AND A."RelateType" = 1 )),19,2),',','.') WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" != '0' AND T0."DocCur"='$' AND T0."U_EC_FE" IN ('CP', 'S') THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL(((SELECT TOP 1 SUM(A."BaseSum") FROM "%sNameDB%"."PCH4" A WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry AND A."RelateType" = 1 )+T0."DiscSum"),19,2),',','.') WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" = '0' AND T0."DocCur"='USD' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL(((SELECT TOP 1 SUM(A."BaseSumSys") FROM "%sNameDB%"."PCH4" A WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry AND A."RelateType" = 1 )+T0."DiscSum"),19,2),',','.') WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" != '0' AND T0."DocCur"='USD' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL(((SELECT TOP 1 SUM(A."BaseSumSys") FROM "%sNameDB%"."PCH4" A WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry AND A."RelateType" = 1 )+T0."DiscSum"),19,2),',','.') ELSE REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL(((SELECT TOP 1 SUM(A."BaseSum") FROM "%sNameDB%"."PCH4" A WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry AND A."RelateType" = 1 )),19,2),',','.') END AS "totalBaseImponible",
CASE WHEN T0."DocCur"='USD' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL(((SELECT TOP 1 SUM(A."BaseSum") FROM "%sNameDB%"."PCH4" A WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry AND A."RelateType" = 1)+T0."VatSumFC"),19,2),',','.') WHEN T0."DocCur"='$' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL(((SELECT TOP 1 SUM(A."BaseSum") FROM "%sNameDB%"."PCH4" A WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry AND A."RelateType" = 1)+T0."VatSum"+(SELECT IFNULL(SUM(A."WTAmnt"),0) FROM "%sNameDB%"."INV5" A INNER JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OWHT" B ON A."WTCode"=B."WTCode" WHERE A."AbsEntry" = :DocEntry AND B."U_HBT_TipRet" = '10')),19,2),',','.') ELSE REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."BaseAmntFC"+T0."VatSumFC"),19,2),',','.') END AS "totalBrutoConImpuesto",
CASE WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" = '0' AND T0."DocCur"='$' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL(((SELECT TOP 1 SUM(A."BaseSum")FROM "%sNameDB%"."PCH4" A WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry AND A."RelateType" = 1)+T0."VatSum"+T0."RoundDif"+(SELECT IFNULL(SUM(A."WTAmnt"),0) FROM "%sNameDB%"."INV5" A INNER JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OWHT" B ON A."WTCode"=B."WTCode" WHERE A."AbsEntry" = :DocEntry AND B."U_HBT_TipRet" = '10')),19,2),',','.') WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" != '0' AND T0."DocCur"='$' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL(((SELECT TOP 1 SUM(A."BaseSum") FROM "%sNameDB%"."PCH4" A WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry AND A."RelateType" = 1)+T0."VatSum"+T0."RoundDif"+(SELECT IFNULL(SUM(A."WTAmnt"),0) FROM "%sNameDB%"."INV5" A INNER JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OWHT" B ON A."WTCode"=B."WTCode" WHERE A."AbsEntry" = :DocEntry AND B."U_HBT_TipRet" = '10')),19,2),',','.') WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" = '0' AND T0."DocCur"='USD' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."BaseAmntFC"+T0."VatSumFC"+T0."RoundDifFC"),19,2),',','.') WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" != '0' AND T0."DocCur"='USD' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."BaseAmntFC"+T0."VatSumFC"+T0."RoundDifFC"+T0."DiscSum"),19,2),',','.') ELSE REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."BaseAmntFC"+T0."VatSumFC"+T0."RoundDifFC"),19,2),',','.') END AS "totalMonto",
CASE WHEN T0."U_EC_FE" IN ('CP', 'S') THEN (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT "StcCode") FROM "%sNameDB%"."PCH4" WHERE "DocEntry" = :DocEntry ) ELSE (SELECT COUNT("ItemCode") FROM "%sNameDB%"."PCH1" WHERE "DocEntry" = :DocEntry) END AS "totalProductos",
CASE WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" = '0' AND T0."DocCur"='$' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((SELECT TOP 1 SUM(A."BaseSum") FROM "%sNameDB%"."PCH4" A WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry AND A."RelateType" = 1 ),19,2),',','.') WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" != '0' AND T0."DocCur"='$' AND T0."U_EC_FE" IN ('CP', 'S') THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL(((SELECT TOP 1 SUM(A."BaseSum") FROM "%sNameDB%"."PCH4" A WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry AND A."RelateType" = 1 )),19,2),',','.') WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" != '0' AND T0."DocCur"='$' AND T0."U_EC_FE" IN ('CP', 'S') THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL(((SELECT TOP 1 SUM(A."BaseSum") FROM "%sNameDB%"."PCH4" A WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry AND A."RelateType" = 1 )+T0."DiscSum"),19,2),',','.') WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" = '0' AND T0."DocCur"='USD' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."BaseAmntFC"),19,2),',','.') WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" != '0' AND T0."DocCur"='USD' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."BaseAmntFC"),19,2),',','.') ELSE REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."BaseAmntFC"),19,2),',','.') END AS "totalSinImpuestos",
T0."U_BO_DESC" AS "Desc_Codigo",
'Descuento Comercial' AS "Desc_descripcion",
'0' AS "Desc_indicador",
CASE WHEN LEFT(T0."DiscSum", 1) = '-' AND T0."U_EC_FE" IN ('CP', 'S') THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((0),19,2),',','.') WHEN LEFT(T0."DiscSum", 1) != '-' AND T0."U_EC_FE" IN ('CP', 'S') THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((0),19,2),',','.') ELSE REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."DiscSum"),19,2),',','.') END AS "Desc_monto",
((SELECT TOP 1 SUM(A."BaseSum") FROM "%sNameDB%"."PCH4" A WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry)+0) AS "Desc_montoBase",
REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."DiscPrcnt"),19,2),',','.') AS "Desc_porcentaje",
'0' AS "Desc_secuencia",
CASE WHEN (SELECT "U_BO_Pref" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOEBILLINGP" WHERE "U_BO_Status"='Y') = 'Y' THEN (T8."U_BO_PREF"||(T0."DocNum"-50000)) ELSE CAST(T0."DocNum" AS NVARCHAR(20)) END AS "consecutivoDocumento",
T8."U_BO_PREF" AS "Prefijo",
--TO_VARCHAR((T0."DocDate"), 'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' 00:00:00' AS "fechaEmision",
TO_VARCHAR(('20230327'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' 00:00:00' AS "fechaEmision",
TO_VARCHAR(T0."DocDueDate", 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "fechaDeVencimiento",
T5."U_HBT_ActEco" AS "actividadEconomicaCIIU",
'0' AS "canalDeEntrega",
CASE WHEN T5."U_BO_E_mail_1" IS NULL THEN (SELECT TOP 1 A."U_BO_EmailGen" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOEBILLINGP" A WHERE A."U_BO_Status" = 'Y') ELSE T5."U_BO_E_mail_1" END AS "correoEntrega1",
T5."U_BO_E_mail_2" AS "correoEntrega2",
T5."U_BO_E_mail_3" AS "correoEntrega3",
T5."U_BO_E_mail_4" AS "correoEntrega4",
T5."U_BO_E_mail_5" AS "correoEntrega5",
TO_VARCHAR(T0."DocDate", 'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' 00:00:00' AS "fechaProgramada",
'1' AS "nitProveedorReceptor",

'01' AS "codigoImpuesto",

--CASE WHEN T13."U_HBT_MunMed" = '11001' THEN '11' ELSE T13."U_BO_CD" END AS "codigoDepartamento",

CASE WHEN T4."StreetB" IS NULL THEN T5."Address" ELSE T4."StreetB" END AS "direccion",

CASE WHEN T5."U_BO_E_mail_1" IS NULL THEN (SELECT TOP 1 A."U_BO_EmailGen" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOEBILLINGP" A WHERE A."U_BO_Status" = 'Y') ELSE T5."U_BO_E_mail_1" END AS "email",

T5."U_BO_RF" AS "obligaciones",
T5."U_BO_TR" AS "regimen",

'01' AS "numeroDeReferencia",

(SELECT count(W."AbsEntry") FROM "%sNameDB%"."ATC1" W WHERE W."AbsEntry" = T0."AtcEntry") AS "CantidadAdjuntos",
T0."AtcEntry" AS "DocEntryAdjuntos"

WHERE T0."DocEntry" = :DocEntry AND T0."DocSubType" != 'DN';
ELSEIF ( :Object = '18' AND :Tipo = 'Lineas') THEN SELECT '1' AS "cantidadPorEmpaque",
CASE WHEN REPLACE(ROUND(TO_DECIMAL((T0."Quantity"),19,2),2),',','.') = '0.00' THEN '1.00' ELSE REPLACE(ROUND(TO_DECIMAL((T0."Quantity"),19,2),2),',','.') END AS "cantidadReal",
CASE WHEN T2."U_BO_UMDIAN" IS NULL or IFNULL(T2."U_BO_UMDIAN",'')='' THEN '94' ELSE '94'END AS "cantidadRealUnidadMedida",
CASE WHEN REPLACE(ROUND(TO_DECIMAL((T0."Quantity"),19,2),2),',','.') = '0.00' THEN '1.00' ELSE REPLACE(ROUND(TO_DECIMAL((T0."Quantity"),19,2),2),',','.') END AS "cantidadUnidades",
IFNULL(T0."ItemCode",'Servicio') AS "codigoProducto", T0."Dscription" AS "descripcion", TO_VARCHAR(T3."DocDate", 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "descripcion2", '999' AS "estandarCodigo", IFNULL(T0."ItemCode",'Servicio') AS "estandarCodigoProducto",
REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."LineTotal"),19,2),',','.') AS "baseImponibleTOTALImp",
'01' AS "codigoTOTALImp", '' AS "controlInterno",
REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."VatPrcnt"),19,2),',','.') AS "porcentajeTOTALImp",
'94' AS "unidadMedida", '' AS "unidadMedidaTributo",
CASE WHEN IFNULL(T0."DiscPrcnt",0) = '0' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL(((T0."LineTotal"*T0."VatPrcnt")/100),19,2),',','.') WHEN IFNULL(T0."DiscPrcnt",0) != '0' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((((T0."LineTotal")*T0."VatPrcnt")/100),19,2),',','.') ELSE '0' END AS "valorTOTALImp",
'' AS "valorTributoUnidad",
CASE WHEN IFNULL(T0."DiscPrcnt",0) = '0' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL(((T0."LineTotal"*T0."VatPrcnt")/100),19,2),',','.') WHEN IFNULL(T0."DiscPrcnt",0) != '0' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((( (T0."LineTotal")*T0."VatPrcnt")/100),19,2),',','.') ELSE '0' END AS "montoTotal",
'' AS "marca", '0' AS "muestraGratis",
CASE WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" = '0' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."LineTotal" + T0."VatSum"),19,2),',','.') ELSE REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL(((T0."LineTotal") + T0."VatSum"),19,2),',','.') END AS "precioTotal",
REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."LineTotal"),19,2),',','.') AS "precioTotalSinImpuestos",
CASE WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" = '0' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."Price"),19,2),',','.') WHEN LEFT(T0."DiscPrcnt") != '-' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."Price"),19,2),',','.') ELSE REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."PriceBefDi"),19,2),',','.') END AS "precioVentaUnitario",
T0."VisOrder"+1 AS "secuencia",
CASE WHEN T2."U_BO_UMDIAN" IS NULL THEN '94' ELSE T2."U_BO_UMDIAN" END AS "unidadMedida",
CASE WHEN LEFT(T0."DiscPrcnt",1) = '-' THEN '0.00' ELSE REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((IFNULL(T0."DiscPrcnt",0)),19,2),',','.')END AS "Desc_porcentaje",
'Descuento Comercial' AS "Desc_descripcion",
'0' AS "Desc_indicador",
CASE WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" = '0' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((IFNULL(T0."LineTotal",0)),19,2),',','.') ELSE REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((((T0."PriceBefDi"*T0."Quantity")*IFNULL(T0."DiscPrcnt",0))/100),19,2),',','.') END AS "Desc_monto",
CASE WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" = '0' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."LineTotal"),19,2),',','.') ELSE REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."PriceBefDi"*T0."Quantity"),19,2),',','.') END AS "Desc_montoBase",
'1' AS "Desc_secuencia"
FROM "%sNameDB%"."PCH1" T0 LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OITM" T1 ON T0."ItemCode"=T1."ItemCode" LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."@BOUNDMED" T2 ON T1."SalUnitMsr"=T2."Code" LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OPCH" T3 ON T0."DocEntry"=T3."DocEntry"
WHERE T0."DocEntry" = :DocEntry AND T3."DocSubType" != 'DN'
ORDER BY T0."VisOrder" ;
ELSEIF ( :Object = '18' AND :Tipo = 'Impuestos') THEN --------------------------- Consulta Impuestos IVA ---------------------------------------
SELECT REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((SUM(T0."BaseSum")),19,2),',','.') AS "baseImponibleTOTALImp",

REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."TaxRate"),19,2),',','.') AS "porcentajeTOTALImp",

REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((SUM(T0."TaxSum")),19,2),',','.') AS "valorTOTALImp"

SELECT (SELECT CASE B."Decimals" WHEN '-1' THEN (SELECT TOP 1 "QueryDec" FROM "%sNameDB%"."OADM") ELSE B."Decimals" END FROM "%sNameDB%"."ORPC" A LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OCRN" B ON A."DocCur"=B."CurrCode" WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry) AS "CantidadDecimales",
CASE T0."DocCur" WHEN '$' THEN 'COP' ELSE T0."DocCur" END AS "Moneda",
REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."DocRate"),19,0),',','.') AS "tasaDeCambio",
TO_VARCHAR((T0."DocDate"), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "fechaDeTasaDeCambio",
(T8."U_BO_PREF" || '-' || ('501')) AS "RangoNmeracion",
CASE WHEN (SELECT CASE B."Decimals" WHEN '-1' THEN (SELECT TOP 1 "QueryDec" FROM "%sNameDB%"."OADM") ELSE B."Decimals" END FROM "%sNameDB%"."ORPC" A LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OCRN" B ON A."DocCur"=B."CurrCode" WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry)= '0' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."RoundDif"),19,0),',','.') WHEN (SELECT CASE B."Decimals" WHEN '-1' THEN (SELECT TOP 1 "QueryDec" FROM "%sNameDB%"."OADM") ELSE B."Decimals" END FROM "%sNameDB%"."ORPC" A LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OCRN" B ON A."DocCur"=B."CurrCode" WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry)= '1' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."RoundDif"),19,1),',','.') WHEN (SELECT CASE B."Decimals" WHEN '-1' THEN (SELECT TOP 1 "QueryDec" FROM "%sNameDB%"."OADM") ELSE B."Decimals" END FROM "%sNameDB%"."ORPC" A LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OCRN" B ON A."DocCur"=B."CurrCode" WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry)= '2' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."RoundDif"),19,2),',','.') WHEN (SELECT CASE B."Decimals" WHEN '-1' THEN (SELECT TOP 1 "QueryDec" FROM "%sNameDB%"."OADM") ELSE B."Decimals" END FROM "%sNameDB%"."ORPC" A LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OCRN" B ON A."DocCur"=B."CurrCode" WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry)= '3' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."RoundDif"),19,3),',','.') WHEN (SELECT CASE B."Decimals" WHEN '-1' THEN (SELECT TOP 1 "QueryDec" FROM "%sNameDB%"."OADM") ELSE B."Decimals" END FROM "%sNameDB%"."ORPC" A LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OCRN" B ON A."DocCur"=B."CurrCode" WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry)= '4' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."RoundDif"),19,4),',','.') WHEN (SELECT CASE B."Decimals" WHEN '-1' THEN (SELECT TOP 1 "QueryDec" FROM "%sNameDB%"."OADM") ELSE B."Decimals" END FROM "%sNameDB%"."ORPC" A LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OCRN" B ON A."DocCur"=B."CurrCode" WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry)= '5' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."RoundDif"),19,5),',','.') WHEN (SELECT CASE B."Decimals" WHEN '-1' THEN (SELECT TOP 1 "QueryDec" FROM "%sNameDB%"."OADM") ELSE B."Decimals" END FROM "%sNameDB%"."ORPC" A LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OCRN" B ON A."DocCur"=B."CurrCode" WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry)= '6' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."RoundDif"),19,6),',','.') ELSE '0' END AS "RedondeoAplicado",
CASE WHEN (SELECT A."Code" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOSERNUM" A WHERE A."Code" = T0."Series") = T0."Series" AND T0."DocSubType" != 'DN' AND T0."ObjType" = '13' THEN '01' WHEN (SELECT A."Code" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOSERNUM" A WHERE A."Code" = T0."Series") = T0."Series" AND T0."DocSubType" != 'DN' AND T0."ObjType" = '13' THEN '03' WHEN (SELECT A."Code" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOSERNUM" A WHERE A."Code" = T0."Series") = T0."Series" AND T0."DocSubType" != 'DN' AND T0."ObjType" = '14' THEN '91' WHEN (SELECT A."Code" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOSERNUM" A WHERE A."Code" = T0."Series") = T0."Series" AND T0."DocSubType" = 'DN' AND T0."ObjType" = '13' THEN '92' WHEN (SELECT A."Code" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOSERNUM" A WHERE A."Code" = T0."Series") = T0."Series" AND T0."DocSubType" != 'DN' AND T0."ObjType" = '18' THEN '05' ELSE '0' END AS "tipoDocumento",
(SELECT TOP 1 A."U_BO_TO" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOEBILLINGP" A WHERE A."U_BO_Status" = 'Y') AS "tipoOperacion",
CASE WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" = '0' AND T0."DocCur"='$' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL(((SELECT TOP 1 SUM(A."BaseSum") FROM "%sNameDB%"."RPC4" A WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry AND A."RelateType" = 1 )),19,2),',','.') WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" != '0' AND T0."DocCur"='$' AND T0."U_EC_FE" IN ('CP', 'S') THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL(((SELECT TOP 1 SUM(A."BaseSum") FROM "%sNameDB%"."RPC4" A WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry AND A."RelateType" = 1 )),19,2),',','.') WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" != '0' AND T0."DocCur"='$' AND T0."U_EC_FE" IN ('CP', 'S') THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL(((SELECT TOP 1 SUM(A."BaseSum") FROM "%sNameDB%"."RPC4" A WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry AND A."RelateType" = 1 )+T0."DiscSum"),19,2),',','.') WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" = '0' AND T0."DocCur"='USD' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL(((SELECT TOP 1 SUM(A."BaseSumSys") FROM "%sNameDB%"."RPC4" A WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry AND A."RelateType" = 1 )+T0."DiscSum"),19,2),',','.') WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" != '0' AND T0."DocCur"='USD' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL(((SELECT TOP 1 SUM(A."BaseSumSys") FROM "%sNameDB%"."RPC4" A WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry AND A."RelateType" = 1 )+T0."DiscSum"),19,2),',','.') ELSE REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL(((SELECT TOP 1 SUM(A."BaseSum") FROM "%sNameDB%"."RPC4" A WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry AND A."RelateType" = 1 )),19,2),',','.') END AS "totalBaseImponible",
CASE WHEN T0."DocCur"='USD' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL(((SELECT TOP 1 SUM(A."BaseSum") FROM "%sNameDB%"."RPC4" A WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry AND A."RelateType" = 1)+T0."VatSumFC"),19,2),',','.') WHEN T0."DocCur"='$' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL(((SELECT TOP 1 SUM(A."BaseSum") FROM "%sNameDB%"."RPC4" A WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry AND A."RelateType" = 1)+T0."VatSum"+(SELECT IFNULL(SUM(A."WTAmnt"),0) FROM "%sNameDB%"."INV5" A INNER JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OWHT" B ON A."WTCode"=B."WTCode" WHERE A."AbsEntry" = :DocEntry AND B."U_HBT_TipRet" = '10')),19,2),',','.') ELSE REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."BaseAmntFC"+T0."VatSumFC"),19,2),',','.') END AS "totalBrutoConImpuesto",
CASE WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" = '0' AND T0."DocCur"='$' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL(((SELECT TOP 1 SUM(A."BaseSum")FROM "%sNameDB%"."RPC4" A WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry AND A."RelateType" = 1)+T0."VatSum"+T0."RoundDif"+(SELECT IFNULL(SUM(A."WTAmnt"),0) FROM "%sNameDB%"."INV5" A INNER JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OWHT" B ON A."WTCode"=B."WTCode" WHERE A."AbsEntry" = :DocEntry AND B."U_HBT_TipRet" = '10')),19,2),',','.') WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" != '0' AND T0."DocCur"='$' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL(((SELECT TOP 1 SUM(A."BaseSum") FROM "%sNameDB%"."RPC4" A WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry AND A."RelateType" = 1)+T0."VatSum"+T0."RoundDif"+(SELECT IFNULL(SUM(A."WTAmnt"),0) FROM "%sNameDB%"."INV5" A INNER JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OWHT" B ON A."WTCode"=B."WTCode" WHERE A."AbsEntry" = :DocEntry AND B."U_HBT_TipRet" = '10')),19,2),',','.') WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" = '0' AND T0."DocCur"='USD' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."BaseAmntFC"+T0."VatSumFC"+T0."RoundDifFC"),19,2),',','.') WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" != '0' AND T0."DocCur"='USD' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."BaseAmntFC"+T0."VatSumFC"+T0."RoundDifFC"+T0."DiscSum"),19,2),',','.') ELSE REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."BaseAmntFC"+T0."VatSumFC"+T0."RoundDifFC"),19,2),',','.') END AS "totalMonto",
CASE WHEN T0."U_EC_FE" IN ('CP', 'S') THEN (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT "StcCode") FROM "%sNameDB%"."RPC4" WHERE "DocEntry" = :DocEntry ) ELSE (SELECT COUNT("ItemCode") FROM "%sNameDB%"."RPC1" WHERE "DocEntry" = :DocEntry) END AS "totalProductos",
CASE WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" = '0' AND T0."DocCur"='$' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((SELECT TOP 1 SUM(A."BaseSum") FROM "%sNameDB%"."RPC4" A WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry AND A."RelateType" = 1 ),19,2),',','.') WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" != '0' AND T0."DocCur"='$' AND T0."U_EC_FE" IN ('CP', 'S') THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL(((SELECT TOP 1 SUM(A."BaseSum") FROM "%sNameDB%"."RPC4" A WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry AND A."RelateType" = 1 )),19,2),',','.') WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" != '0' AND T0."DocCur"='$' AND T0."U_EC_FE" IN ('CP', 'S') THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL(((SELECT TOP 1 SUM(A."BaseSum") FROM "%sNameDB%"."RPC4" A WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry AND A."RelateType" = 1 )+T0."DiscSum"),19,2),',','.') WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" = '0' AND T0."DocCur"='USD' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."BaseAmntFC"),19,2),',','.') WHEN T0."DiscPrcnt" != '0' AND T0."DocCur"='USD' THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."BaseAmntFC"),19,2),',','.') ELSE REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."BaseAmntFC"),19,2),',','.') END AS "totalSinImpuestos",
T0."U_BO_DESC" AS "Desc_Codigo",
'Descuento Comercial' AS "Desc_descripcion",
'0' AS "Desc_indicador",
CASE WHEN LEFT(T0."DiscSum", 1) = '-' AND T0."U_EC_FE" IN ('CP', 'S') THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((0),19,2),',','.') WHEN LEFT(T0."DiscSum", 1) != '-' AND T0."U_EC_FE" IN ('CP', 'S') THEN REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((0),19,2),',','.') ELSE REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."DiscSum"),19,2),',','.') END AS "Desc_monto",
((SELECT TOP 1 SUM(A."BaseSum") FROM "%sNameDB%"."RPC4" A WHERE A."DocEntry" = :DocEntry)+0) AS "Desc_montoBase",
REPLACE(TO_DECIMAL((T0."DiscPrcnt"),19,2),',','.') AS "Desc_porcentaje",
'0' AS "Desc_secuencia",
CASE WHEN (SELECT "U_BO_Pref" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOEBILLINGP" WHERE "U_BO_Status"='Y') = 'Y' THEN (T8."U_BO_PREF"||(T0."DocNum"-50000)) ELSE CAST(T0."DocNum" AS NVARCHAR(20)) END AS "consecutivoDocumento",
T8."U_BO_PREF" AS "Prefijo",
TO_VARCHAR((T0."DocDate"), 'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' 00:00:00' AS "fechaEmision",
--TO_VARCHAR(('20211119'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' 00:00:00' AS "fechaEmision",
TO_VARCHAR(T0."DocDueDate", 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "fechaDeVencimiento",
T5."U_HBT_ActEco" AS "actividadEconomicaCIIU",
'0' AS "canalDeEntrega",
CASE WHEN T5."U_BO_E_mail_1" IS NULL THEN (SELECT TOP 1 A."U_BO_EmailGen" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOEBILLINGP" A WHERE A."U_BO_Status" = 'Y') ELSE T5."U_BO_E_mail_1" END AS "correoEntrega1",
T5."U_BO_E_mail_2" AS "correoEntrega2",
T5."U_BO_E_mail_3" AS "correoEntrega3",
T5."U_BO_E_mail_4" AS "correoEntrega4",
T5."U_BO_E_mail_5" AS "correoEntrega5",
TO_VARCHAR(T0."DocDate", 'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' 00:00:00' AS "fechaProgramada",
'1' AS "nitProveedorReceptor",

'01' AS "codigoImpuesto",
CASE WHEN T4."CityB" IS NULL THEN 'BOGOTA' ELSE T4."CityB" END AS "ciudad",
--CASE WHEN T13."U_HBT_MunMed" = '11001' THEN '11' ELSE T13."U_BO_CD" END AS "codigoDepartamento",
'11' AS "codigoDepartamento",
